text: nim'modeyanu adam‌ra makkala mulaka janisida avara santatigalannu, svatah tam'ma virud'dhave saksigalagisi ‘‘nanu nim'ma odeyanallave?’’ Endu kelidaga avaru, ‘‘yakalla? Adakke nave saksigalu’’ endiddaru. Nale punarut'thana dina nivu i kuritu namagenu tilidiralilla ennabaradendu hige madalayitu
